events.message: The insured contacted us to file a claim after their vehicle was involved in a collision on 2024-04-28, reporting damage to the front bumper and windshield.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident based on the keywords described in the initial report involving a car collision.
An agent specialized in auto claims was assigned to manage the case and contact the claimant for further details and assistance.
Acknowledgement of the claim was sent to the customer, including explanation of the process and the expected timeline for assessment and repair.
Requested police report, photos of the damage, and repair estimates from the customer to support the vehicle collision claim.
Customer provided all requested documents, including a detailed police report and several high-resolution images of the car after the accident.
Investigation into the claim began, involving assessment of submitted evidence and contacting third parties involved to verify details of the accident.
Investigation concluded successfully with confirmation of liability and damage extent consistent with the accident report and submitted evidence.
A settlement offer was proposed to the insured detailing estimated coverage for repairs and compensation for the vehicle accident.
The customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the handling of their auto accident claim.
Claim approval was granted based on the evaluation results and customer acceptance of the proposed settlement offer for the car damages.
The settlement payment was processed and issued to the customerâ€™s account covering all agreed amounts for repair and recompense.
The claim was officially closed after payment issuance and confirmation that the customer was satisfied with the resolution of their vehicle accident case.
All claim documents, investigation results, and correspondence were archived for future reference and compliance with record keeping policies.
